column1: Kata Robata////For nigiri and rolls we got the Sushi platter than came with 10 nigiri and tropical or non-tropical tuna roll. The 10 nigiri pieces were salmon
column9: fish roe and eel. All beautifully served which you can really tell they care about quality. This came with a tuna roll which was topped with avocado and black fish roe. We also grabbed a Rising Sun roll featuring yellowtail
column12: truffle vinaigrette. The Peppercorn tuna was the focal point of this roll. I just wish that the roll was evenly covered with the truffle vinaigrette because my bite didn't bring everything together since I didn't get any.
